summary: It is meant to make easy enemies easy to kill while making more difficult enemies harder to kill.
descriptionHtml:
I changed the damage for adept to where you will do 2x normal damage while npc's will do 3x normal damage.
I removed the flames and healing start spells.
npc's do less damage to dragons.
It is meant to make easy enemies easy to kill while making more difficult enemies harder to kill this is a work in progress so if you have any feedback
let me know.

I had already uploaded this top bethesda.net.

Future update:
no health regen.
My twitter is xdragonsamuraix
author: thedragonsamurai
